org.spongepowered.api.text

Interface TextFactory


  • public interface TextFactory
    Represents the required implementation for the static methods in Texts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getLegacyChar()
      Returns the default legacy formatting character.
      TextRepresentation json()
      Get a TextRepresentation for the Mojangson representation of a Text object.
      TextRepresentation legacy(char legacyChar)
      Return a representation that accepts and outputs legacy color codes, using the provided legacy character.
      String replaceLegacyCodes(String text, char from, char to)
      Replaces the given formatting character with another given formatting character from a legacy string.
      String stripLegacyCodes(String text, char code)
      Removes the legacy formatting character from a legacy string.
      String toPlain(Text text)
      Returns a plain text representation of the Text without any formattings.
      String toPlain(Text text, Locale locale)
      Returns a plain text representation of the Text without any formatting in the provided Locale.
      TextRepresentation xml()
      Get a TextRepresentation for the TextXML representation of a Text object.

    • Method Detail

      • toPlain

        String toPlain(Text text)
        Returns a plain text representation of the Text without any formattings.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to convert
        Returns:
        The text converted to plain text

      • toPlain

        String toPlain(Text text,
               Locale locale)
        Returns a plain text representation of the Text without any formatting in the provided Locale.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to convert
        locale - The language to get the plain string in
        Returns:
        The text converted to plain text

        Get a TextRepresentation for the Mojangson representation of a Text object.
        Returns:

      • xml

        Get a TextRepresentation for the TextXML representation of a Text object.
        Returns:
        The xml text serializer

      • getLegacyChar

        char getLegacyChar()
        Returns the default legacy formatting character.
        Returns:
        The legacy formatting character

      • legacy

        TextRepresentation legacy(char legacyChar)
        Return a representation that accepts and outputs legacy color codes, using the provided legacy character.
        Parameters:
        legacyChar - The legacy character to parse and output using
        Returns:
        The appropriate legacy representation handler

      • stripLegacyCodes

        String stripLegacyCodes(String text,
                        char code)
        Removes the legacy formatting character from a legacy string.
        Parameters:
        text - The legacy text as a String
        code - The color character to be replaced
        Returns:
        The stripped text

      • replaceLegacyCodes

        String replaceLegacyCodes(String text,
                          char from,
                          char to)
        Replaces the given formatting character with another given formatting character from a legacy string.
        Parameters:
        text - The legacy text as a String
        from - The color character to be replaced
        to - The color character to replace with
        Returns:
        The replaced text
